item.title: Office Developer Tools for Visual Studio 2012 Released
item.description: The Visual Studio 2012 extensions for developing Office 2013 and Office 365 applications is now officially released. Office Developer Tools for Visual Studio 2012 Download. You can read more at the announcement from S. Somasegarâ€™s blog: Now Available: Office Developer Tools for Visual Studio 2012
